Header: SFHQ-C Troops Support Blood Donation Drive
Content: Troops at the Security Force Headquarters - Central (SFHQ-C) lent their full support to conduct a blood donation campaign, launched by Ceylon Thowheed Jamath Association branch at Bandarawela on Saturday (15) at Bandarawela District Hospital. Army personnel and villagers participated in the programme and supported it. A total of 10 plus Army personnel, including one Officer donated blood.
